verbs.description: [ARG0: PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP CRITICIZES CANADIAN PRIME MINISTER TRUDEAU OVER TRADE IN NEW TWEET] , [V: SAYS] " [ARG1: JUSTIN ACTS HURT WHEN CALLED OUT] ! "
